name: The Long Night (Chroodles)
description:
Made in 7 days for the Game Jelly 1 game jam!

Chop, fish, mine, trade and hire your way away from this strange land. An idle/gathering style game, with minor city development aspects.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

E: Interact (Mine, fish, woodcut, talk, open chests)

Q: Pause/View controls/Change volume

P: Teleport to start (Use this if you get stuck somehow)

B: Save game

M: Load game
